description: This Rust source file defines a `ThunderSessionService` struct with an async method `get_account_session` that retrieves device and account information via ThunderClient calls, wraps the result into an `AccountSession` struct, or returns an error if retrieval fails.

classes.name: ThunderSessionService
classes.description: A service class providing an async method to retrieve an account session by making multiple asynchronous calls to ThunderClient.

methods.name: thunder_getter( client: ThunderClient, method: String, prop: &'static str, default: &'static str, ) -> String
methods.description: An async helper function that sends a DeviceCallRequest via ThunderClient, logs the response, and extracts a string property from the response, falling back to a default if not found.

methods.name: get_account_session(state: &ThunderState) -> Result<AccountSession, RippleError>
methods.description: An async method that retrieves device ID, service account ID, partner ID, and access token via ThunderClient calls, and constructs an AccountSession object if all are successfully obtained, otherwise returns an error.

ctags.name: get_account_session
ctags.pattern: /^    pub async fn get_account_session(state: &ThunderState) -> Result<AccountSession, RippleError/

ctags.name: thunder_getter
ctags.signature: ( client: ThunderClient, method: String, prop: &'static str, default: &'static str, ) -> String
